nodes.text: Yuzzum was the native language of the Yuzzum species from the Forest Moon of Endor. It was a spoken musical-sounding language.

Many linguists consider that Yuzzum language was the protolanguage for Ewokese; however, Yuzzum language did not evolve itself, so it coexisted with its own descendant, spoken by a different people. The protocol droid C-3PO spoke this language.
